name: Gauss Effect
description:
You need to defend the metalworks...but somebody's locked the weapons cabinet! Good thing all this heavy metal is around.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift/Click - Shoot a Magnetic Bullet that Pulls Metal Towards You
  • Space - Repulsion Blast That Pushes Metal Away From You
  • R - Restart
  • H - Erase Highscore

Credits

  • DavidKBD - Music
  • Wenrexa - Icons
  • UntiedGames - Explosion Animation
  • Kenney - Splat Sprites
  • Ditharts - Environment & Character Sprites
